name: NWConnection.State
desc: States indicating whether a connection can be used to send and receive data.

items.name: case setup
items.desc: The connection has been initialized but not started.

items.name: case waiting(NWError)
items.desc: The connection is waiting for a network path change.

items.name: case preparing
items.desc: The connection in the process of being established.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The connection is established, and ready to send and receive data.

items.name: case failed(NWError)
items.desc: The connection has disconnected or encountered an error.

items.name: static func != (NWConnection.State, NWConnection.State) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
